{{Infobox dungeon |name = New Mauville |image = [[File:New Mauville.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of New Mauville |tokens = 24,000 |location = South of Mauville City, East of Route 110. }} '''New Mauville''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 260,000 |- | Boss || 850,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Magnemite * Voltorb * Magneton (boss) * Electrode (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
